title: Amino for Pokémon Sun and Moon
description:
Pokémon Sun and Moon players unite! Join the fastest growing community for Pokémon Sun and Moon in the Alola region! Meet other players and fans, discuss gameplay, characters, and plotlines, and share and discover fan creations! Amino for Pokémon Sun and Moon is like a forum, chat, and fan community all rolled into one!
- CHAT with other Alola trainers and meet new friends around the world
- DISCOVER new Pokémon Sun and Moon game trivia and art
- GET the latest news and updates on the game
- SHARE your game reviews, recommendations, and original creations
- LEARN from and CONTRIBUTE to our Sun and Moon catalog - an encyclopedia of all things Pokémon Sun and Moon
